Multivariable Calculus | Surface integrals over vector fields.

\begin{array}{l}\n\iiint_{S} \overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{F}} \cdot d \vec{S} \\\n\| \hat{\boldsymbol{F}} \cdot\left(\overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{r}}_{\boldsymbol{u}} \times \overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{r}}_{\boldsymbol{v}}\right) d \boldsymbol{A}\n\end{array}[imath]\iiint_{S} \overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{F}} \cdot d \vec{S} [/imath] [imath]\| \hat{\boldsymbol{F}} \cdot\left(\overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{r}}_{\boldsymbol{u}} \times \overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{r}}_{\boldsymbol{v}}\right) d \boldsymbol{A}[/imath]
